title: Does Valve Still Matter as a Developer? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.21.21
description:
Greg and Tim talk about Valve making more games, Apple making VR, and Kevin making sounds.

00:00:00 - Start
00:11:00 - Housekeeping
There’s a new episode of the Blessing Show up! youtube.com/kindafunnygames

00:23:15 - Tencent is going to buy a gaming company?

00:40:30 - Trump? Still Banned on Twitch, Matt TM Kim @ IGN
00:42:40 - Why are Among Us Updates Taking So long?
